attachments.title: Apple’s MacBook Event Rumored For October 27
attachments.text: So earlier today we reported that Apple’s MacBook launch for October was still on schedule. This is despite the fact that we’re approaching the...
attachments.fallback: Ubergizmo: Apple’s MacBook Event Rumored For October 27

text: > It is also rumored that Apple could be dropping the old USB ports in favor of USB-C, which we guess is to be expected but we reckon will still prove to be highly inconvenient at this point in time.
More fun for the Apple superfans, so glad I managed to talk the bosses into buying me a nice Linux box with about 500 USB ports
It's a little rough around the edges and heavier than Black Sabbath 4, but that's fine by me
the only thing I plug into my mac is a cable to charge my iphone, so as long as there’s a USB-C version of that I’m good to go!
I'm just trying to decide on whether to buy my USB-C cables now or wait for the announcement :stuck_out_tongue:
